name: Between Hell and Heaven
desc: An ever-expanding fictional universe, Gods, Monsters, Heroes and Wars. The lore document never stops growing.

name: Arcanum
desc: A Worldbuilding App full of essential and even trivial features for every writer's need. Uses SupabaseDB.

name: Contradictionism
desc: A philosophy project by me. It has more pratical things rather than experiments.

name: Kingslayer
desc: A 2D game, about an assassin who must defeat the 8 kings to save the world from perils.

name: Wevo
desc: A Discord bot primirilary for creating embeds and sending them through webhooks. Wevo is short for WebhookEvo.

name: EidolonOS (EOS)
desc: EidolonOS (EOS) is a free, open-source, GitHub-based profile builder for creating aesthetic, interactive personal websites.

name: Wings and Ashes
desc: A WB based on GoT but more grounded. Gritty Fantasy with a touch of Medieavel life.
